sqlMap.statement: insert into oskari_groupings_data ( Name, DataId, DataType, OskariGroupingThemeId, status ) values (?,?,?,?,?)
sqlMap.select: select Id, Name,DataId,DataType,OskariGroupingThemeId,status from oskari_groupings_data where DataType = 1 UNION ALL select g.Id, m.locale As name,g.DataId,g.DataType,g.OskariGroupingThemeId,g.status from oskari_groupings_data g, oskari_maplayer m where g.DataType = 0 and m.id = g.dataid

select Id, Name,DataId,DataType,OskariGroupingThemeId,status from oskari_groupings_data where DataType = 1 and OskariGroupingThemeId = #id# UNION ALL select g.Id, m.locale As name,g.DataId,g.DataType,g.OskariGroupingThemeId,g.status from oskari_groupings_data g, oskari_maplayer m where g.DataType = 0 and m.id = g.dataid and g.OskariGroupingThemeId = #id#
select Id, Name,DataId,DataType,OskariGroupingThemeId,status from oskari_groupings_data where DataType = 1 and OskariGroupingThemeId is not null
